eu.hydrologis.jgrass.uibuilder.fields
Class DataField

java.lang.Object
  eu.hydrologis.jgrass.uibuilder.fields.DataField
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<DataField>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommandField, GenericOptionField, OnOffOptionField, OptionField
public abstract class DataField
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DataField>

Represents a data field of some type.

Author:
Patrick Ohnewein

Field Detail

xmlNode

private org.w3c.dom.Node xmlNode
The XML which rapresents this DataField. Can be null, because it is not required that DataField objects get loaded from XML files. But if loaded the node can contain additional attributes.

The (unique) field name

Constructor Detail

DataField

public DataField(org.w3c.dom.Node xmlNode,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String desc,
                 java.lang.String repr,
                 boolean required,
                 java.lang.String defaultValue,
                 int order)
Instantiate a new DataField.

Parameters:
xmlNode - optional xml node representing the data field
name - the (unique) name of the field
desc - a short description of the field
repr - the command line representation of the field (# gets replaced by the actual value)
order - the order in which the field should appear when rendered in the UI together with other fields
